entity.name: The Situation Room
entity.description: "The Situation Room With Wolf Blitzer" is the command center for breaking news, politics and extraordinary reports from around the world. Patterned after the concept of the White House Situation Room, CNN's lead political anchor Wolf Blitzer hosts newsmakers and experts to discuss and analyze the stories that are driving today's news.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: Despite the coronavirus pandemic, thousands are gathering for a huge INDOOR @realDonaldTrump campaign rally in Tulsa. We have @CNN journalists on the scene including @abbydphillip @ryanobles @MartinSavidge & @GaryTuchmanCNN. I’ll anchor a special @CNNSitRoom tonight 7-10PM ET https://t.co/TZV9lBpWW0
